sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Button, Modal, Container, Row, Col, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Settings() { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { daily_time, daily_break, weekly_break } = useSelector( state => state.settings ); return (<> setModalShow(false) } size="lg"> Panel CarrotHR Maksymalny dzienny czas pracy: Minimalna przerwa miÄ™dzy zmianami: Minimalna tygodniowa przerwa: ) } export default Settings;
